caption.p: Life-history costs of growth to survival in Cypripedium parviflorum ( a), C. candidum ( b) and Ophrys sphegodes ( c). Survival decreased with size in both Cypripedium species and in vegetative Ophrys, but increased with size in flowering Ophrys. In all cases, P (survival) refers to the probability of surviving from year t to year t + 1. Plotted lines in ( a) and ( b) refer to different states in year t − 1, while plotted lines in ( c) refer to different states in year t.
